InsufficientBalance(uint256,uint256).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

addController(address).details: Add an address allowed to control this contract

params._calldata: the calldata to pass to the diamond init contract

params.symbol: the symbol of the diamond to check

params.initData: the initialization data for the factory

isController(address).details: Check if this address is a controller

relinquishControl().details: Remove the sender address from the list of controllers

params.facetSet: the index of the facet to set

ControllerAdded(address,address).notice: emitted when a controller is added.

ControllerRemoved(address,address).notice: emitted when a controller is removed.

createFromSet((address,address,address,s.notice: create a new diamond token with the given symbol

getDiamondAddress(string).notice: get the address of the diamond

getFacets(string).notice: get the facets for the diamond

removeFacets(string).notice: remote a facet set from the factory

setFacets(string,(address,uint8,bytes4[].notice: set a number of template facets on this factory

symbols().notice: get all the symbols from the factory

userdoc.notice: This contract is used to create new Diamond contracts.
